name: read
description:
Read a file. Use when text context is missing or stale. Do not repeat read on unchanged file unless new context is needed.

Optional format modes:
- numbered: "  42| const x = 1"
- raw: "const x = 1"
- hashline: "42:ab12|const x = 1"

Accepted arg aliases:
- absolute_path -> path
- style/mode/view -> format

feedback.read_is_directory:
FORMAT ERROR: {{tool:read}} failed: path is a directory.
ACTION: Use {{tool:ls}}(path) to list files, then call {{tool:read}} on a file path.
feedback.read_file_not_found:
FORMAT ERROR: {{tool:read}} failed: file not found.
ACTION: Use {{tool:ls}}(path) or {{tool:glob}}(pat, path) to locate the correct file, then call {{tool:read}} with the valid path.
